participant_1.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.
my favorite food is anything italian.
My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.
i work at a restaurant as waiter.
i have 5 children.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite food?
I love anything Italian, but I also love seafood.
I love going to The Olive Garden.
I love that place! Have you ever been to Thailand?
Yes! I went there a few years ago and it was amazing! I saw all the floating markets and had so much fun.
That sounds amazing! What did you do there?
I went to the beach, ate a lot of delicious food, and spent a lot of time with my family. It was a great trip.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm so glad you had a good time.
Me too! I'm looking forward to going back someday.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
